summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to expenditures to meet the City of Seattle's obligations to the Washington State Convention and Trade Center (WSCTC); appropriating funds from the Washington State Convention and Trade Center Fund to pay for the City's contribution to the WSCTC capital expansion of facilities; increasing an appropriate expenditure allowance in the City of Seattle's 1998 budget; and carrying over that expenditure authority to future years unless expressly abandoned by ordinance; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
